promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic simple sea-horse water-type pokemon wearing ornate gemstones. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or sea-horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemnaqua, a a dynamic simple sea-horse water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Knock Over. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "sea-horse", "water" or "Gemnaqua". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, sea-horse-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: This aquatic crystal beauty, known for ambushing prey with its Knock Over ability, adorns riverbeds with its shimmering presence.
